titleStmt.title: An epistle concerning the government of Christ and his peace of vvhose kingdome, there shall be no end. By George Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Benjamin Clark, in George-yard, in Lombard-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
